thread.title: Halliburton posts loss as charges weigh
thread.title_full: Halliburton posts loss as charges weigh | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: Halliburton posts loss as charges weigh
text:
Halliburton Co ( HAL.N ), the world's No.2 oilfield services provider, posted a quarterly loss, hurt mainly by charges related to asset write-offs and severance costs.
Net loss attributable to the company was $54 million, or 6 cents per share, in the third quarter ended Sept. 30, compared with a profit of $1.20 billion, or $1.41 per share, a year earlier.
Revenue fell nearly 36 percent to $5.58 billion.
(Reporting by Sneha Banerjee and Amrutha Gayathri in Bengaluru; Editing by Anil D'Silva)
